title: Did Notre Dame's colleagues ask Barrett to run the Supreme Court nomination process?
subtitle: Amy Connie Barrett's nomination for the U.S. Supreme Court came less than a week after Judge Ruth Bader Jensburg died.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In an open letter written by dozens of Notre Dame colleagues from Judge Amy Connie Barrett, the Supreme Court candidate for President Donald Trump, he asked her to "stop the nomination process" until after the election.
